title: Existence and Computation of Maximin Fair Allocations Under Matroid-Rank Valuations
description: Fair division of $m$ indivisible goods among $n$ agents.
results: MMS+PO allocation in polytime for submodular valuations with binary marginals.
Theorem 2: Instance with $n=2$, $m=4$, and XOS valuations with binary marginals where better than $1/2$-MMS allocations don't exist.
Theorem 3: Instance with $n=2$, $m=4$, and weighted matroid-rank valuations where an MMS allocation doesn't exist.
